entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 08:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: N 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
